Contradict fact: The claim in the Facebook post contradicts the fact that Kobe Bryant and his daughter, Gianna, did not share the same birthday.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that both Kobe Bryant and his daughter were born on Aug. 23.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a false Facebook post and not verified information.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Kobe Bryant and his daughter shared the same birthday based on incorrect information.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Kobe Bryant and his daughter were not born on the same day, as confirmed by their actual birthdates.
